data.title: Lucrezia Borgia (1947 film)
data.meta_description: Lucrezia Borgia (SpanishLucrecia Borgia) is a 1947 Argentine historical film directed by Luis Bayn Herrera and starring Olinda Bozn, Hctor Quintanilla and Gog Andreu. The film portrays the life of Lucrezia Borgia (14801519). The film's sets were designed by the art director Juan Manuel Concado
